mapper.select: select schedulingId,doctorId,cost,state,date from ( (select id as schedulingId,doctor_id as doctorId,date,state from scheduling where doctor_id=#{doctorId}) as a natural join (select id as doctorId,doctor_class as class from doctor) as b natural join (select id as class,cost from class_cost )as c )
mapper.insert: insert into scheduling (id, doctor_id, date, number, state) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into scheduling
id,
doctor_id,
date,
number,
state,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update scheduling
doctor_id = #{doctorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
date = #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
